alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Albany, central Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Feura Bush to near Roxbury. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Hunter, Delmar, Guilderland, Westerlo, Ravena, Voorheesville, Windham, Gilboa, Prattsville, Livingstonville, Preston-Potter Hollow, Feura Bush, Preston Hollow, New Scotland, Coeymans, Durham, Rensselaerville, Ashland and Clarksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for east central New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene
